# Scripts

Bundled resources for test-orchestrator skill

- [x] test_selector.py: Script to intelligently select tests to run based on code changes, using git diff and test mapping.
- [x] test_executor.py: Script to execute tests in parallel, managing dependencies and retrying flaky tests.
- [x] report_generator.py: Script to generate test reports in various formats (JUnit, HTML).
